name: simplemaths
0:
”Alexa open simple maths”
”tell me gcd of 45 and 5”
”tell me area and perimeter of rectangle of length 5 and breadth 6”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple maths
des: This skill is all about basic maths like kids. They can have fun and they can get some knowledge.They can start with addition,subtraction,multiplication,division,hcf of two numbers,lcm of two numbers,even or odd,prime or not prime,tables,area and perimter of different shapes like cube,square for small kids not like complex -cuboid etc.It would be fun
